what is sexy Is it tight black lace Coy confidence Showing a little skin In the world of Burlesque shows sexy can be any of these things as long as it keeps your eyes glued to the tantalizing dancer PERIOD Burlesque shows are strip shows with sass that depend more on teasing the audience than whambamming them with nudity PERIOD Dont get me wrong there is definitely nudity in Burlesque but its all about the style PERIOD

St PERIOD Louis actually has a pretty vibrant Burlesque scene PERIOD Venues like Albino Alley Cat  Washington Ave. Off Broadway  Lemp Ave. and the Fox Hole at Atomic Cowboy  Manchester Rd. host regular shows and dancers like Lola van Ella are local legends PERIOD While traditionally Burlesque shows can include everything from beautiful ladies to sideshow acts nowadays the main attraction is the girls PERIOD Troops of dancers will travel around the country to perform PERIOD

Although the dancers do remove their clothes during the performances the etiquette at a Burlesque show is very different from that of a strip club PERIOD For one thing it is not customary to tip Burlesque dancers PERIOD These girls consider what they do to be strictly a performance PERIOD Its erotic in nature and meant to arouse but its more a form of art exhibiting the body and sexuality PERIOD The dancers are still highly responsive to the audiences reactions and will flirt and sass them PERIOD The atmosphere at shows is always lighthearted one that embraces sexuality instead of making it taboo or embarrassing PERIOD

But what can you expect at a Burlesque show Well there are no diehard rules about what an act will contain PERIOD Each dancer selects her own routine costume and props PERIOD Gravity Plays Favorites act involves a sexy duo in fringe climbing and contorting themselves around a pole PERIOD GoGo McGreggor billed as the gorgeous gal from Glasgow is all about dancing demurely around with a riding crop PERIOD Then theres Lola van Ella the Derriere Beyond Compare who can make a pair of elbow length gloves seems hotter than any of Victorias Secrets PERIOD

Theres a reason why Lolas known as the best around said senior Veronica Harwin PERIOD

All of the acts have as much flair as the assumed personalities of the dancers PERIOD The only real similarities between acts are the high heels the pinup girl hair and make up and the fact that the dancers end their performance wearing nothing more than pasties PERIOD

Burlesque is all about making sexuality open and fun PERIOD The dancers put on a show thats flirty and celebrates everything that sexy can be PERIOD So go on head out to a show and embrace the tassel twirling good time PERIOD
